backend/main.mo: Actor managing players, cash, profiles, rewards, and rate‑limited coin pickups with admin-only cash controls and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping game rendering and asset‑upgrade features to affected files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and game systems.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page that loads the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that checks Internet Identity auth and conditionally renders the SignInPage or GamePage.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeaderboard: Admin-only UI card allowing admins to enforce leaderboard leadership with feedback states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Shared layout component providing header, footer, and main content structure for the game UI.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Displays the cash leaderboard with rank styling, admin markers, user highlighting, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with visual states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/game/runner/runnerAssets.ts: Loads and manages image assets for coins, obstacles, track tiles, and player sprites.
Canvas component that renders the 3D runner scene, handling scaling, asset loading, and drawing entities with perspective.
frontend/src/game/runner/RunnerHUD.tsx: Displays cash, distance, coin count, and error messages as an in-game HUD.
Renders start, pause, game over, and in‑run overlays with controls for gameplay state transitions.
frontend/src/game/runner/runnerRenderUti: Contains detailed procedural rendering helpers for coins, obstacles, and other objects.
frontend/src/game/runner/runnerTheme.ts: Converts CSS theme variables to canvas‑friendly colors and offers brightness adjustment utilities.
frontend/src/game/runner/TouchControls.t: Provides on-screen mobile controls for movement, jumping, and sliding.
frontend/src/game/runner/types.ts: Defines runner game domain types, lane constants, player state, entities, run states, and config values.
frontend/src/game/runner/useCoinCashAwar: Batches coin awards and triggers addCash mutations with a delayed flush to avoid backend spam.
frontend/src/game/runner/useRunnerContro: Handles keyboard controls for lane changes, jumping, sliding, and pausing, exposing equivalents for touch input.
frontend/src/game/runner/useRunnerGame.t: Implements the main runner game loop with spawning, movement, collision, coin collection, and state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Loads an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCashActions.ts: Provides mutations for initializing cash, adding cash, claiming rewards, and upgrading speed, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCashLeaderboard.ts: Fetches the cash leaderboard with polling, using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnforceAdminLeader: Runs a mutation to set the admin as leaderboard leader and refreshes related queries with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsurePlayerInitia: Coordinates player initialization by checking status, running initializeCash when needed, and exposing readiness state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerStatus.ts: Fetches the player's status periodically using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Queries whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables, themes, and base styles including canvas and text-selection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Implements the main gameplay page, initializing the player, managing runner game state, controls, and rendering 3D canvas and HUD components with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Renders a sign‑in screen with branding, feature highlights, and a login button inside the game layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, image needs, and state versioning for the visual detail upgrade project.
